{"id":831192837,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1666847833,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/831192837/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s == \"\") return 0;\n        int tmp = (1 << (s[0] - 'a')), cur0 = 0, cur1 = 1;\n        int ans = 0;\n        while(cur1 - s.size()){\n            if((tmp ^ (1 << (s[cur1] - 'a'))) > tmp){\n                tmp ^= (1 << (s[cur1] - 'a'));\n                if(cur1 - s.size()) cur1++;\n            }\n            else tmp ^= (1 << (s[cur0] - 'a')), cur0++;\n            ans = max(ans, cur1 - cur0);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
